title: Lightyear Frontier
description:
Start your interstellar homestead in this peaceful open-world farming adventure Build your sustainable exofarm, grow alien crops, customize your mech, and explore a new world full of mystery with up to three friends
Live the quiet life as you take in the sights and sounds of your new home. Enjoy a low-stress, combat -free experience without the need to manage things like thirst and hunger. Just focus on farming, exploration, and discovery Relax to a chill, atmospheric cosmic country soundtrack Farm, build, and explore in a customizable mech Choose from an array of tools, unlock new upgrades, and personalize your mech with an assortment of paint choices and mech parts. Battle Bands: Rock & Roll Deckbuilder

system_requirements.Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 1050 / AMD Radeon RX 460

game_info.Genre: Adventure, Casual, Indie, Simulation, Early Access
